properties.description: Open 10 am till 4 pm on Thursdays , all welcome. Free coffee, biscuits and warm snacks. Citizens Advice advice available in the Crypt between 10 and 2 pm without prior appointment.
properties.title: Cosy Crypt

properties.address: His Place, Hastings, East Sussex TN34 1HL
properties.description: Community cafe and centre space, Ground floor level, disabled accessible. Sensory room. Activity hall. Community kitchen. Friendly environment run by volunteers. Variety of spaces including lounge areas with TV and dvd access, computers to borrow on site - request at counter, games, craft activities. No purchase necessary to use the space. Signposting and advocacy support.

hours._text: Monday: 10:00 - 16:00, Tuesday: 10:00 - 15:00, Wednesday: 10:00 - 15:00, Friday: 10:00 - 15:00, Saturday: 10:00 - 15:00 Fortnightly, Sunday: 10:00 - 12:00

properties.address: Pebsham Community Centre, East Sussex TN40 2SW

properties.title: Pebsham Warm Welcome

properties.address: Southwater Centre, St Leonards on Sea, Uk TN37 6LB
properties.description: Seaview offers a warm and welcoming space for people experiencing poverty including homelessness to anyone that needs support. Many of our guests are experiencing issues with poor mental health, addictions , neurdiversity, various long term health conditions and often a combination of these
properties.title: Seaview Project

properties.address: The Pelham, Bexhill, East Sussex TN40 2DD
properties.description: Everyone is welcome from Monday to Friday, from 9.30am - 2.30pm. Our Coffee Lounge is open for people to purchase affordable food in, as well as to request a gift hot drink or meal if required. The space will be warm and you will be welcomed by our team of volunteers and staff. There will be the opportunity to see other support and social opportunities.
properties.title: The Pelham Coffee Lounge
